entry.title: New release for EspoCRM:
entry.content:
Enhancements:

  • Collaborators https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3190
  • Reactions https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3194
  • Emails: Scheduled Send https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3200
  • Web-to-Lead forms https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3217
  • View user access https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3199
  • App secrets https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3148

Improvements:

  • Tab quick search https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3173
  • Multiple assigned users enabled with parameter in entity manager https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3158
  • Stream Updated At field https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3209
  • Stream notes about assignment for entity types with multiple assigned users https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3159
  • Cases: Hidden from portal https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3213
  • Formula: Support object in record\create and record\update https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3160
  • Formula: ext\markdown\transform function https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3169
  • Ability to set links read-only via admin UI https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3162
  • Stream: Quote reply on posts https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3163
  • Emails: Notification about assignment https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3171
  • Emails: Ability to move emails from group folders to Archive and Trash https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3172
  • Emails: Adding email to inbox of assigned user when creating task https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3177
  • Emails in stream improvements https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3237
  • Emails: Ability to view and add users for regular users https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3185
  • Email filters: Parameter to skip notification https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3187
  • Emails: Adding team users when an email is added to a group folder https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3188
  • Indicating starred record on list view https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3142
  • Text field: Preview https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3178
  • Text field: Uploading images on pasting from clipboard https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3179
  • List view column resize https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3186
  • Contact and Account link parameters for custom entities for portal access https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3210
  • Password: Parameter to require special characters https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3212
  • Entity Manager: Parameter to preserve audit log https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3176
  • Font and icons update https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3226
  • Category view improvements https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3227
  • Activities/History/Tasks panels available in bottom https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3234

Compatibility & changes:

  • PHP 8.4 support
  • Drop PHP 8.1 support
  • Removal of deprecations in back-end https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3203
  • Removal of deprecations in front-end https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3202
  • Changes in Entity interface https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3201
  • Not allowing to update relation using {link}Ids attribute if there's no link-multiple field https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3175
  • Webhooks: Signature instead of X-Signature https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/issues/3220

All issues: https://github.com/espocrm/espocrm/milestone/202?closed=1
